body:
Federico,

UTCI uses a big 200-term polynomial approximation, which can all be found here:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/ladybug...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/src/ladybug_ladybug.py#L4043-L4320)

This polynomial was derived from thousands of simulations with Fiala human energy balance model and survey results of adaptive clothing behavior in the outdoors.
